articles.title: iOS 18.4 Release Date: Apple Surprisingly Confirms iPhone Update And New App - Forbes
articles.description: Apple has just confirmed when the next big iPhone update will be released, something it rarely does at this point in the cycle.
articles.content:
The next major iPhone software release is iOS 18.4 (unless theres a bug-squisher in between). Apple rarely announces in advance when a big update is on its way, but it just did: its set for April.
